content: What is the difference between a list and a tuple in Python?
subject: python

options.optionName: List is mutable, Tuple is immutable
options.name: option1

options.optionName: List uses square brackets, Tuple uses parentheses
options.name: option2

options.optionName: List has more built-in methods, Tuple has fewer methods
options.name: option3

options.optionName: List is used for mutable collections, Tuple is used for immutable collections
options.name: option4
